entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
